title: Low Priority Queues
body: Hey riot i so i was on a game and have recently had been disconnected from the games because of technical issues its says league of legends has disconnected is it ok if u take off my queues ive seem to fix the issue please riot username TAPURSISTER

replies.body:
Unfortunately low priority bans can't be removed from an account, especially in cases like yours where they were issued correctly.

On the bright side though, now that you've fixed the issue you should have any more issues with low priority queue. In fact, if you play enough games without disconnecting, you'll be allowed disconnect a few times without punishment for when there's something out of your control (e.g random power cut, family emergency etc.)

Unfortunately you will still have to sit through your LPQ games, as that is the point of the system. 

> [CAN YOU TAKE ME OUT OF LOW PRIORITY QUEUE?](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h2q6)
No. We will not take your account out of low priority queue under any circumstances.

On the positive side, at least you have the issue fixed now :)
